sentences.en: Analytical solutions for three dimensional elasticity problems are quite difficult to obtain.
sentences.cn: 三维弹性问题的解析解是很难得到的.

sentences.en: But an extensive water surface is not two - dimensional.
sentences.cn: 然而地球的辽阔水面都不是平面.

sentences.en: Experimental difficulties are also compounded in solving problems in three - dimensional fracture mechanics.
sentences.cn: 用实验方法解决三维断裂力学中的问题也存在多种多样的困难.

sentences.en: For finite - dimensional spaces determinants can be brought into play.
sentences.cn: 在有限维空间中可以运用行列式.

sentences.en: I found the characters very two-dimensional, not to say dull.
sentences.cn: 我觉得那些人物形象即使不说是乏味无聊，至少也是毫无深度。

sentences.en: If the dimensional shift in either direction is greater than our previously set threshold, increment the total deviation by the amount moved in both directions.
sentences.cn: 如果在任意方向上的空间移位大于我们先前设定的阈值，就按照两个方向上移动的量增加总偏差。

sentences.en: It is of course possible to produce three - dimensional maps by plastic modelling.
sentences.cn: 制作 立体 地图,当然可用以采用塑料成型的方法.

sentences.en: Of particular note is the deviation threshold parameter and the dimensional shift parameters.
sentences.cn: 需要特别注意的是偏差阈值参数和空间移位参数。

sentences.en: The formula on definite proportion exists not only in plane figure but also in three-dimensional figure.
sentences.cn: 平面图形中有定比分点公式，在空间图形中也存在同样的定比分点公式。

sentences.en: The image exhibits three - dimensional characteristics, ie , the parallax effect.
sentences.cn: 物象显现三维特征, 也即具有视差效应.

sentences.en: The investigation was extended to the study of a three - dimensional granular medium.
sentences.cn: 将这项研究推广到对三维颗粒状介质的考察.

sentences.en: The plane is two dimensional in points.
sentences.cn: 平面在点几何中是二维的.

sentences.en: There are many ways of generating a two - dimensional representation of an object.
sentences.cn: 有很多制作物体二维图的方法.

sentences.en: This phenomenon , peculiar to the two - dimensional wave motion, is sometimes called diffusion.
sentences.cn: 二维波所特有的这种现象, 有时叫做弥散现象.

sentences.en: Two - dimensional collisions, both elastic and inelastic, may be demonstrated on this table.
sentences.cn: 在这个桌上, 可以演示二 维 的弹性和非弹性碰撞.

sentences.en: Up to now we have restricted ourselves to one - dimensional , one - particle systems.
sentences.cn: 迄今,我们限于一 维 一粒子体系.

sentences.en: We can attribute this to the three dimensional nature of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们把此归结为问题的三维本性.

sentences.en: We can now use tetrahedron and hexahedron elements in three - dimensional stress analysis.
sentences.cn: 我们现在在三维应力分析中采用四面体单元和六面体单元.

phrases.tran_cn: 一维艺术；单维的；单向度
三维结构；立体构成；智力三维结构模型
adj. 二维的，平面的；二元的

trans.tran_cn: 空间的，尺寸的，〈数〉因次的，…次元的
